```{r}
library(tidyverse)
load("./data/fina.rda")
```

```{r}
# Denormalize, combining results, phases (a.k.a. heats), events
detailed_results <- fina_join()
```

## Filter to separate competitions (same named competitions)
## 99 competitions 
```{r}
comps <- detailed_results %>% group_by(competition) %>% summarise(n = n())
sepdetailed_results <- detailed_results %>% separate(col = competition, into = c("competitionname", "year"),
                              sep = -4) 
finaldetailed_results <- sepdetailed_results %>% separate(col = competitionname, into = c("n/a", "compname"),
                                                          sep = +5)
test1 <- finaldetailed_results %>% group_by(compname) %>% summarise(n = n())

```

```{r}

```

## Filter by competition
```{r}
sepdetailed_results %>% filter(competitionname == "FINA Swimming World Cup ")
View(test1)
```
